140155.story_desc: A letter from the Restricted Zone Logistics Officer Gilbert to his daughter Lila in the Overworld.

140156.name: Golden Badge
140156.story_desc: A badge representing justice. It might shed some light on this Disciple of Sanctus Medicus' social identity. If you flaunt it carelessly, you'll only invite unwanted ridicule to yourself.

140157.name: Disciples of Sanctus Medicus Letter
140157.story_desc: A letter between the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus. The correct words will only appear in the hands of the intended recipient.

140158.name: Folded Photo
140158.story_desc: A family photo taken somewhere not on the Xianzhou Luofu. Evidently, this Disciple of Sanctus Medicus came from a different world. He came here either chasing the distant idea of immortality or to cure a disease. He has a bright smile in the photo, drastically different to how he looked when you met him on the street. "We'll take another family photo together on the seaside rocks when you're back..."

140159.name: Strange Prescription
140159.story_desc: A medical prescription. The messy writing makes one question the sanity of the author. "5 mace of Daiyu angelica, 3 mace of Tian Dong, mixed into the... of Xianzhou natives who have reached 600 years of age."

140161.name: Delivery Package
140161.story_desc: A standard package for delivery. It is tightly sealed and heading towards its recipient.

140162.name: Weapon Shards
140162.story_desc: A polearm that was sliced in half. One can imagine the fate that befell its master.

140163.name: Shattered Jade Seal
140163.story_desc: A token required to traverse across an important location. Looks like the process of acquiring this token was not very smooth.

140164.name: Dud Grenade
140164.story_desc: A grenade with its pin pulled. It is silent, as though it might start growling at any moment. "A little gift for the lost..."

140165.name: Language Module
140165.story_desc: A chip for regulating language mastery, especially for standard-issue Belobogian Automaton.

140166.name: Luocha's Paper Flower
140166.story_desc: A piece of paper casually folded into a flower. The petals are delicate and life-like, and one wonders what kind of person would have bestowed such likenesses onto the paper.

140167.name: A Note Between Book Pages
140167.story_desc: This seems to be a page torn from a Department of Insight researcher's notebook. It is full of obscure and difficult symbols and sentences. There are cute cat stickers on the back of the page — the owner was probably a cat lover. "For Department of Insight internal use only. Do not leak out this document."

140168.name: The Adventurous Moles: Hidden Treasure — Table of Contents
140168.story_desc: A few pages from a children's adventure book very popular in Belobog. "The Moles, the Moles, are brilliant and strong! The Moles, the Moles, take the reins!"

140169.name: The Adventurous Moles: Hidden Treasure — Preface
140169.story_desc: A few pages from a children's adventure book very popular in Belobog. "The Moles, the Moles, are brilliant and strong! The Moles, the Moles, take the reins!"

140170.name: The Adventurous Moles: Hidden Treasure — "The Unexpected Parchment"
140170.story_desc: A few pages from a children's adventure book very popular in Belobog. "The Moles, the Moles, are brilliant and strong! The Moles, the Moles, take the reins!"

140171.name: The Adventurous Moles: Hidden Treasure — "The Missing Miner's Lamp"
140171.story_desc: A few pages from a children's adventure book very popular in Belobog. "The Moles, the Moles, are brilliant and strong! The Moles, the Moles, take the reins!"

140172.name: The Adventurous Moles: Hidden Treasure — "The Crates Are the Keys"
140172.story_desc: A few pages from a children's adventure book very popular in Belobog. "The Moles, the Moles, are brilliant and strong! The Moles, the Moles, take the reins!"

140173.name: The Adventurous Moles: Hidden Treasure — "Treasure Hunt on the Battlefield"
140173.story_desc: A few pages from a children's adventure book very popular in Belobog. "The Moles, the Moles, are brilliant and strong! The Moles, the Moles, take the reins!"

140174.name: The Adventurous Moles: Hidden Treasure — Postface
140174.story_desc: A few pages from a children's adventure book very popular in Belobog. "The Moles, the Moles, are brilliant and strong! The Moles, the Moles, take the reins!"

140175.name: IPC Designer Invite
140175.story_desc: An invitation for joining the Interastral Peace Corporation as a designer. Enthusiastic, cordial, with an astonishing salary offer. "Congratulations, Designer Ryan. We warmly invite you to join the IPC Technology Department."

140176.name: Artisanship Commission Standard Parts Set
140176.story_desc: Standard parts set from the Artisanship Commission used to assemble different aurumatons. "I've told you a hundred times before that we want to industrialize. In. Dus. Tri. Al. Ize!"

140177.name: Chengjie's Paper Boat
140177.story_desc: This boat Chengjie folded out of paper is like a tiny starskiff. Meticulously made and cute. "Master, I've finally graduated!"

140178.name: Perfect Geomarrow Crystal
140178.story_desc:
A fist-sized geomarrow crystal, reflecting an indigo luster.
That supervisor Antonia probably knows how much it's worth.

140179.name: <unbreak>80%</unbreak> New Thermal Mining Pickaxe
140179.story_desc:
A thermal mining pickaxe for Underworld miners. Often on-sold.
80% new.

140180.name: <unbreak>60%</unbreak> New Thermal Mining Pickaxe
140180.story_desc:
A thermal mining pickaxe for Underworld miners. Often on-sold.
60% new.

140181.name: Dazzling Rainbowite
140181.story_desc:
Only the extremely lucky can get their hands on this crystal.
It doesn't look like it has any practical value, but it could be sold for a very good price.

140182.name: Dirty Mechanical Part
140182.story_desc: A small part used for mechanical production. Smaller than a person's fist. "It is this small part that supports an avenger's moral cleanliness."

140183.name: Old Tin Box
140183.story_desc: A rather artsy tin box sitting there silently like a book. "Please put this tin box on sale on the shelf on the second row to the right of Spare Time Book Shop's door..."

140184.name: A Bottle of Draconic Tears
140184.story_desc: Mineral deposit formed by some kind of creature. Rumored to be pearls that solidified from drakons' tears, and is very popular among Outworlders who love such legends. "Drakons in the ancient sea, centuries long they may live. Tears shed dry into pearls, fat burns in lamps of old."

140185.name: Transcribed Scripture
140185.story_desc: A Xianzhou-style scroll, on which Thousand-Handed Merciful Medicus' Salvation is written 500 times. Closer inspection reveals the last few hundred handwritings to be different from the first few hundred ones. Let's hope this doesn't get discovered.

140186.name: Undelivered Letter
140186.story_desc: An unsent letter addressed home. The author seems to have undergone some experimental "treatment."

140187.name: Mini-Neutron Bomb
140187.story_desc: A small nuclear weapon. Its countdown will begin automatically when it no longer detects the registrant's vital signs — In other words, you can't just throw it away. "Maybe we can chuck it in a lake somewhere..."

140188.name: Access Code for the "Chest"
140188.story_desc: An access code provided by a weird person. Go to Starskiff Haven and give it to Ziqiao. Maybe you'll get a pleasant surprise.

140189.name: Clothes for "That Teacher"
140189.story_desc: A silly teacher forgot to wear clothes when he left in the morning. Go give him these clothes.

140190.name: Research Records "Trying to Persuade"
140190.story_desc: Everyone has a beating heart. Emotions are often more effective than logic when persuading someone.

140191.name: Research Records "Pretend to Be an Officer"
140191.story_desc: The Realm-Keeping Commission require their officers to be upright, kind, just, industrious, and empathetic. Not many people in reality can tick all those boxes.

140192.name: Research Records "Intimidating"
140192.story_desc: Ever seen a fist this big? It's all yours~

140193.name: Research Records "Bribing"
140193.story_desc: Any problem you can solve with money isn't a problem. It's a shame money isn't omnipotent.

140194.name: Research Records "Sincere Request"
140194.story_desc: Even those most skilled in lies and flattery often cannot resist the power of "sincerity."

140195.name: Research Records "Title Page"
140195.story_desc: March 7th brandishes this imaginary title page and decisively declares, "The passphrase is maybe — probably — definitely written on it!"

140196.name: Pharmacological Studies on the Draught of Draconic Surge
140196.story_desc: A research report on the Draught of Draconic Surge written by Dan Shu, the Alchemy Commission's genius chief alchemist. Hurry and pass this to the Seat of Divine Foresight.

140197.name: A Medicine Concocted by Dan Shu
140197.story_desc: A medicine Dan Shu concocted for a young patient. Its sweet smell is probably deliberate, made to entice the child to take their medicine properly.

140198.name: Brumedew Concentrate Pellet
140198.story_desc: Dan Shu said this medicine can invigorate the body and prolong one's life. She's the Alchemy Commission's chief alchemist and your close associate — You should be able to trust her and ingest this without issue.

140199.name: Jade Tracer
140199.story_desc: The jade abacus accessory that Yanqing left behind while carrying out an operation. It records his activities, and was dropped at a timely moment to warn the Seat of Divine Foresight.

140200.name: A Scribbled Prescription
140200.story_desc: Messy writing that only a doctor can read. "This prescription can save people, but those who take it will hiccup uncontrollably every single day!"

140201.name: A Nameless Specialty
140201.story_desc: A package containing the gift for Banxia, wrapped in fabric and tied up with twine. "I know she's busy... I wanted to give this to her personally, but now I have to ask you to deliver it to her."

140202.name: Ice-Fresh Raw Frostweave Salmon Slices
140202.story_desc: A row of ready-to-eat raw frostweave salmon slices. The meat is firm and smooth and looks very tasty. "It's all thanks to the Eternal Freeze. We can eat raw fish from 700 years ago!"

140203.name: Mimic Snow Slugs
140203.story_desc: A mimic snow slug, one of the components of the local biome out on the Belobog Snow Plains. They can change their appearance to match the external environment and disguise themselves from their natural enemies. "These slugs taste really good once they've been barbecued over a fire..."

140206.name: Geomarrow Activation Element
140206.story_desc: A universal component in Belobog used to activate Geomarrow conduits. "Bro, you need to ask the real smart people. No one knows how to fix a machine better than Marev."

140207.name: Frostweave Salmon Bread
140207.story_desc: A cold platter made from air-fried preserved frostweave salmon and bread, with a bowl of redsunset jam for free. Nowadays, frostweave salmon are mostly bred inside Belobog's walls. Their taste is miles off from the frostweave salmons fished from the wilds outside the city. "I heard having raw fish slices together with bread can delay the onset of diarrhea effectively. Is that true?" "Heck if I know. Go ask Natasha."

140208.name: Stone-Roasted Meat Skewer
140208.story_desc: The steel skewer has all sorts of Belobog delicacies on it, and is barbecued thoroughly using high heat. Its ingredients are mostly harmless. It is also the favorite food of Belobog's adventurers out in the wild, as well as being the most easily obtainable. "This tastes so good! What kinds of meat are in it, though?" "You wouldn't want to know."

140209.name: Snow Plains Combo Stew
140209.story_desc: The iron bucket contains all sorts of Belobog delicacies as a stew, and is simmered thoroughly using low heat. Ingredients with outlandish appearances float in the soup, but it smells very delicious. "What's wrong if they were once specimens? Aren't they dead animals and plants anyways?"

140210.name: Flash drive with a picture of Pela and her mother
140210.story_desc: A digital data storage component that has been frozen for more than a decade. It looks very primitive. A young girl is being held by someone in the picture, but that someone's face is no longer distinguishable. "Did you hear about that outstanding outdoors explorer who died 16 years ago? The best explorer out of all Belobog..."

140211.name: Meteor Fragment
140211.story_desc: A meteor fragment that bore witness to Belobog's 700 years of decline. It should be returned to the History and Culture Museum.

140212.name: Microfilm
140212.story_desc: A lost roll of film. It should be returned to the History and Culture Museum.

140213.name: Dismantled Art Pieces
140213.story_desc: Parts of the modern sculpture Gears and Wisdom that has been disassembled into countless tiny pieces. These parts have evidently been modified artistically and will not run as a machine.

140215.name: Old Photo: Mechanism Energy Hub
140215.story_desc: An old photo revealing the location of the exhibit "Mechanism Energy Hub."

140216.name: Treasure Map: Cannon
140216.story_desc: A treasure map revealing the location of the exhibit "Cannon."

140218.name: Treasure Map: Information Terminal and Display Monitor Set
140218.story_desc: A treasure map revealing the location of the exhibit "Information Terminal and Display Monitor Set."

140219.name: Qingni's Memories
140219.story_desc: Qingni remembered how affectionate her mother was, but she also remembered how stubborn and unreasonable her mother was when it came to "becoming a pilot."

140220.name: Divine Arrow Embers
140220.story_desc: At the end of the Third Denizens of Abundance War, Reignbow Arbiter's Sky-Shattering Lux Arrow wiped out everything along the way. The Xianzhou people used the burning embers of the arrow to create many divine objects, and this is one of them. Yukong carries it with her, lest she forgets. "We were so happy then. I wish we could stay in those moments forever."

140221.name: Jing Yuan's Memories
140221.story_desc: Jing Yuan still clearly remembers those two young pilots. They were optimistic, brave, and talented. But, he also remembers how it all ended.

140222.name: Yukong's Exchange Diary
140222.story_desc: Yukong hopes to still be that carefree Foxian girl, flying through the skies. But time will always pass by turbulently.

140223.name: Caiyi's Exchange Diary
140223.story_desc: Caiyi hopes that her friend can take care of her daughter, and let her daughter be anything the child wants to be... Except a fighter pilot.

140225.name: Compendium of Remedies
140225.story_desc: A Xianzhou medical compendium compiled by the Alchemy Commission. It includes prescriptions to many decoctions and have been listed in the Required Reading for New Recruits to the Alchemy Commission list. "Memorize these, you will be tested on them."

140228.name: Eerie Twig
140228.story_desc: A branch that exudes an eerie aura, it is a rare ingredient in some prescriptions. "Does this... really have medicinal use?"

140229.name: Lost and Found Notice
140229.story_desc: A lost and found notice for a missing ingenium. "I'm unsure of the exact time, but I lost a Baroumbrella ingenium that can write poetry near Synwood Pavilion in the Exalting Sanctum..."

140230.name: Drifting Clouds
140230.story_desc: A collection of poems left by a Vidyadhara poet from the Xianzhou Luofu that contains 523 untitled poems, and the themes are almost all about extremely mundane things. "To those who love poetry: Whoever does not talk about this collection is shallow and ignorant."

140231.name: Inspo Jade Abacus: Borderland
140231.story_desc: A Jade Abacus that stores machine learning data and codes. It is used to help Cong write poems. "They say 'Poetry cannot be about technology, as it is not romantic,' but technology can be romantic, right?"

140232.name: Unity Lock
140232.story_desc: When Cong emerged from his hatching rebirth, he carried this Unity Lock with him. "If those who love each other are bound by the Unity Lock, they will be united forever."

140233.name: Stainless Steel Plaque
140233.story_desc: In the middle of the reward plaque is written "Genius Diviner." "Your talent and knowledge are as solid as stainless steel."

140234.name: Auspicious XV
140234.story_desc: A new generation flagship jade abacus, its off-white material feels exquisite to the touch. "Never buy an old jade abacus — they put out new models all the time."

140235.name: Cloudbreadth Sleeves Limited Vertical Collar Jacket
140235.story_desc: The Nimbus Chronicles series women's cropped jacket with a stand-up collar launched by Cloudbreadth Sleeves is tailored using mid-length-fiber nylon-wool mixed fabric and pure silk. "The Cloudbreadth Sleeves clothes are delicate, ethereal, and expensive!"

140237.name: Override Module
140237.story_desc: The computer module that Zhongshan handed to you. Adding it to those damaged automatons seems to be able to "resurrect them from the dead." Somehow, this module also has a solar panel attached to it.

140239.name: Torn Manuscript Fragment
140239.story_desc: The torn manuscript contains faintly discernible notes on conjectures related to "Sensor No. 223" and the "big universe time tunnel" theory.

140240.name: A Mysterious Key
140240.story_desc: A slightly rusty key with no clear indication of which lock it corresponds to. Try it on all the locks you can until you find the right one!

140241.name: Torn Manuscript Fragment
140241.story_desc: The torn manuscript contains faintly discernible notes on conjectures related to "Sensor No. 223" and the "big universe time tunnel" theory.

140242.name: A tuskpir wrap bought for Bailu
140242.story_desc: A cake roll that is too cute to eat. It gets its name from the beautiful patterns on the roll that resembles a tuskpir's fur. "This cake roll is so cute and looks like a tuskpir!" "It's actually made of tuskpirs." "???"

140243.name: A songlotus cake bought for Bailu
140243.story_desc: A classic snack made from songlotus on the Luofu. Once you take a bite, it makes a crisp laughing sound. Occasionally, Luofu's gormandizers use it to tease outworlders. "You scared the life out of me!"

140244.name: Berrypheasant skewers bought for Bailu
140244.story_desc: Berrypheasants live in symbiosis with plants, with many fruit hanging from their tail. Berrypheasant Skewers are actually fruit skewers. No Berrypheasants were harmed during the production process. "So... is this a meat dish or a vegetarian dish?"

140245.name: Steamed puffergoat milk bought for Bailu
140245.story_desc: Puffergoat milk, also known as Gentle Halcyon milk, is a specialty of the Xianzhou Alliance. The milk is difficult to preserve and rarely seen outside Xianzhou. It is sweet after warming without needing extra sugar, but it becomes bitter after cooling, so it must be drunk while hot. "According to the Lifitide magazine, General Jing Yuan has to drink a large bowl of freshly-squeezed Puffergoat milk every morning. The Seat of Divine Foresight has denied this report."

140246.name: Mung bean soda bought for Bailu
140246.story_desc: Made from fermented legume-based products. It smells sour and pungent, but tastes cool and refreshing. If you can drink a big bottle of mung bean soda and remain calm, you will definitely impress the gormandizers on the Luofu. "Like mung beans? Like soda? Then what are you complaining about!?"

140247.name: Courier Package
140247.story_desc: A box containing the Golden Cloud Toad. The name and contact information of the sender were deliberately crossed out, but records from Heron Express show that the sender is A-Feng.

140248.name: Payment Record for Exhibits
140248.story_desc: Dock Worker A-Feng's payment record. The record shows recently received credit remitted by the Interastral Peace Corporation, spaced out over several installments.

140249.name: Dock Worker's Testimony
140249.story_desc: The testimony of dock worker A-Feng, who has admitted to disrupting the normal operations of the dock in exchange for payment from the IPC.

140250.name: Rent for Aurum Alley Dock
140250.story_desc: The most tangible achievement of the Aurum Alley revival project. It demonstrates that the Alley still has plenty of life in it.

140251.name: Dock Lease Contract
140251.story_desc: This contract can prove that the Merchant Guild has legitimate rights to operate the dock.

140252.name: Aurum Alley Merchant Guild Turnover
140252.story_desc: The most tangible achievement of the Aurum Alley revival project. It demonstrates that the Alley still has plenty of life in it.

140253.name: Artistry Hardware Sales Analysis
140253.story_desc: Since Artistry Hardware partnered with the dock, its scope of operations has expanded, and its revenue and customer satisfaction have both increased.

140254.name: Aurum Alley Historical Trading Volume
140254.story_desc: It is evident that at its peak, the old Aurum Alley had a trading volume similar to what the Alley has today.

140255.name: Aurum Alley Merchant Guild Bidding Deposit
140255.story_desc: The most tangible achievement of the Aurum Alley revival project. It demonstrates that the Alley still has plenty of life in it.

140256.name: Spices Supreme Crossover Event
140256.story_desc: The Special Combo Set that Spices Supreme has produced serves to prove that the Alley is still a strong contender, and is highly competitive as a food street.

140257.name: Aurum Alley Business Opinion Poll
140257.story_desc: Surveys conducted to gauge the shop owners' intentions. More and more shops have voiced their support for the guild and expressed their confidence in the revival project.

140258.name: Guild Insignia Rubbing (I)
140258.story_desc: A rubbing put together at a particular angle, portraying the secret insignia left by Scholar Bernini, who was Todd's teacher. It seems to be hiding some important information.

140259.name: Guild Insignia Rubbing (II)
140259.story_desc: A rubbing put together at a particular angle, portraying the secret insignia left by Scholar Bernini, who was Todd's teacher. It seems to be hiding some important information.

140260.name: Guild Insignia Rubbing (III)
140260.story_desc: A rubbing put together at a particular angle, portraying the secret insignia left by Scholar Bernini, who was Todd's teacher. It seems to be hiding some important information.

140261.name: Guild Insignia Rubbing (IV)
140261.story_desc: A rubbing put together at a particular angle, portraying the secret insignia left by Scholar Bernini, who was Todd's teacher. It seems to be hiding some important information.

140262.name: Guild Insignia Rubbing (V)
140262.story_desc: A rubbing put together at a particular angle, portraying the secret insignia left by Scholar Bernini, who was Todd's teacher. It seems to be hiding some important information.

140263.name: Guild Insignia Rubbing (VI)
140263.story_desc: A rubbing put together at a particular angle, portraying the secret insignia left by Scholar Bernini, who was Todd's teacher. It seems to be hiding some important information.

140264.name: Guild Insignia Rubbing (VII)
140264.story_desc: A rubbing put together at a particular angle, portraying the secret insignia left by Scholar Bernini, who was Todd's teacher. It seems to be hiding some important information.

140265.name: Guild Insignia Rubbing (VIII)
140265.story_desc: A rubbing put together at a particular angle, portraying the secret insignia left by Scholar Bernini, who was Todd's teacher. It seems to be hiding some important information.

140266.name: "A Departing Voyager"
140266.story_desc: A scene you photographed. It seems to be that of a father and son parting. "I'm going to buy some oranges for you. Stay here and don't wander off, okay?"

140267.name: "Heartbroken Lovers"
140267.story_desc: A scene you photographed. It seems to be that of lovers parting. "Chonghua, I love you. 'Till mara do us part."

140268.name: "Friends Going Separate Ways"
140268.story_desc: A scene you photographed. It seems to be that of friends parting. "I'm afraid we might never see each other again after this goodbye."

140269.name: Inspo Jade Abacus: Graceful
140269.story_desc: A Jade Abacus that stores machine learning data and codes. It is used to help Cong write poems. "They say 'Poetry cannot be about technology, as it is not romantic,' but technology can be romantic, right?"

140270.name: Inspo Jade Abacus: Metrical
140270.story_desc: A Jade Abacus that stores machine learning data and codes. It is used to help Cong write poems. "They say 'Poetry cannot be about technology, as it is not romantic,' but technology can be romantic, right?"

140271.name: Revelation Slate
140271.story_desc: A special stone slate left by the Vidyadhara. There seems to be information about certain "sequences" hidden in its mottled markings. "Follow the lights, as the stone describes."

140272.name: Todd's Notebook
140272.story_desc: Todd always carries his notebook with him to record his profound thoughts and research on different topics.

140273.name: Fan With Plain Carp Print
140273.story_desc: The fan Tingyun carried on her person. It used to be a pair, but one had gone missing.

140274.name: The Amicassador's Seal
140274.story_desc: The minuscule jade stamp worn by Amicassadors of the Sky-Faring Commission.

140275.name: Small Chest Sent to the Sleepless Earl
140275.story_desc: A small chest that stores plant seeds. The crest for the Sleepless Earl is stamped onto the lid.

140276.name: Kitchen Knife Sent to Spices Supreme
140276.story_desc: A sharp kitchen knife wrapped in soft silk. It also contains an advertisement hiring workers for Spices Supreme.

140277.name: An Archery Set Gifted For Someone Unknown
140277.story_desc: An archery set with supreme balance. Surprisingly, it seems to have been completely hand-crafted. No Xianzhou technology was used to create it, and the arrow can't track enemies or automatically make turns.

140278.name: New Tea "Tingyun's Blend"
140278.desc: Upon use, immediately heals one target ally by 36% of the ally's Max HP plus 460 extra HP.
140278.story_desc: A new tea variety brewed using the improved Whale-Tide Spring, Emerald Hills, and Dawndew strains. It has a sweet, long-lasting taste, twirling about inside your mouth like clouds.

140279.name: Chili Oil Beef Offal Stew
140279.desc: When used, instantly recovers 4 Technique Points for the team.
140279.story_desc: A bowl of fresh, fragrant, boiling, and spicy beef offal stew. It's made with yellow boulder beef chunks and offal together with redcloud chili sauce.

140280.name: Soul-Soothing Paper Kite
140280.story_desc: A paper kite commemorating the pilot who can no longer fly.

140281.name: Jade Abacus of Allying Oath
140281.story_desc: One half of the jade abacus of allying oath gifted to you by Jing Yuan. Hold on to the jade abacus and send out information, and the other half will immediately receive it. No matter the distance, the Luofu Cloud Knights will surely arrive at your side and carry out your request.

140282.name: Encryption Key Treasure Map
140282.story_desc: A treasure map guiding players to find the encryption key for the elevator in Herta Space Station's Victory Zone. The map depicts a Wubbaboo hiding inside a room. Finding it might grant access to the elevator encryption key.

140283.name: Treasure Map No. 1
140283.story_desc: A treasure map guiding players to find the Championship Contender Pass in Herta Space Station's Victory Zone. The map depicts a Wubbaboo hiding in... a toilet? Finding it might grant access to the Championship Contender Pass, but the correct toilet needs to be found first.

140284.name: Treasure Map No. 2
140284.story_desc: A treasure map guiding players to find the Championship Contender Pass in Herta Space Station's Victory Zone. The map depicts a Wubbaboo surrounded by paper cranes. Finding it might grant access to the Championship Contender Pass. Try to collect all the paper cranes.

140285.name: Treasure Map No. 3
140285.story_desc: A treasure map guiding players to find the Championship Contender Pass in Herta Space Station's Victory Zone. The map depicts a Wubbaboo hiding in a Curio Cabinet. Finding it might grant access to the Championship Contender Pass. The Curios depicted on the treasure map are Crackup Conch, Joy Filtration Set, Unbearable Weight, and Total Eclipse of the Heart, in that order. Try to arrange these Curios according to the map.

140286.name: Aether Coin
140286.story_desc: A necessary item to play Aetherium Wars. Can store creatures in the form of an Aether — and then manifest them as Aether Spirits to battle against other players. "Collect, battle, train, and upgrade!"

140287.name: Elevator Encryption Key
140287.story_desc: An encryption key hidden by Wubbaboo that activates the elevator in Herta Space Station's Victory Zone. Elevator encryption key specially designed by Herta Space Station for usage in the Aetherium Wars.

140288.name: Championship Contender Pass 1
140288.story_desc: One of three passes required to challenge the championship contender in the Victory Zone of Herta Space Station. With Herta's reluctant consent, the Aetherium Wars Tournament Association revamped the space station and set up obstacles for the players.

140289.name: Championship Contender Pass 2
140289.story_desc: One of three passes required to challenge the championship contender in the Victory Zone of Herta Space Station. With Herta's reluctant consent, the Aetherium Wars Tournament Association revamped the space station and set up obstacles for the players.

140290.name: Championship Contender Pass 3
140290.story_desc: One of three passes required to challenge the championship contender in the Victory Zone of Herta Space Station. With Herta's reluctant consent, the Aetherium Wars Tournament Association revamped the space station and set up obstacles for the players.

140291.name: Icefire Lotus
140291.story_desc: The miracle medicine Mr. Xiyan made up in the story. He claims these medicines have parallels in real life, but you're not silly enough to believe in that. "What {NICKNAME} beholds is a lotus blooming with ice crystals while in flames... This is a medicine that has been extinct since the Theophany Era! The Icefire Lotus!"

140292.name: Life-Death Polypore
140292.story_desc: The miracle medicine Mr. Xiyan made up in the story. He claims these medicines have parallels in real life, but you're not silly enough to believe in that. "What the warrior beholds is a mushroom that seems to waft in and out of existence. This is no mere mushroom. It sits within a state between existence and non-existence, constantly fluctuating between the real and the imaginary... It's called the 'Life-Death Polypore'."

140293.name: Whirlbolt Pneumatophore
140293.story_desc: The miracle medicine Mr. Xiyan made up in the story. He claims these medicines have parallels in real life, but you're not silly enough to believe in that. "There is no wind, yet the aerial roots wave in the wind. The air is cleaved apart and lightning sparks following the curvature of their movements. That is the most precious medicine in all the Alchemy Commission — the Whirlbolt Pneumatophore!"

140294.name: Elixir of Dragon Oil
140294.story_desc: The miracle medicine Mr. Xiyan made up in the story. He claims it can make people "be born anew and achieve transcendence," but the name sounds pretty dodgy. "Listen, this isn't some half-baked 'cure-all quackery'. All it does is help you 'ascend to the heavens,' which is not that far-fetched, plotwise."

140295.name: Growth Booster
140295.story_desc: A high-tech medicine used to nurture starskiff seeds in Mr. Xiyan's story. This thing may exist in reality — just not with the exaggerated effects. "You might not be aware that the seeds used by the Xianzhou to grow starskiffs are of the same origin as the Arbor. Using such wood to make sword hilts won't be the same as using wood straight off the Arbor, but it's more than enough to defeat one mere Lord Ravager." "Seriously?" "Who cares. Just say the lines!"

140296.name: Treasure Map Indicating the Location of Ignis Aureliae
140296.story_desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is a treasure map recording the location of the Ignis Aureliae. But in your eyes, this is just an Alchemy Commission map with a random circle drawn on it. "It is said that 'A Sword Is Mightier When Hidden.' He therefore hid the Ignis Aureliae away from potential thieves before he was incarcerated." "There it is! The classic adventure story trope where a century-old treasure map just gets discovered out of nowhere!"

140297.name: Todd's Snack
140297.story_desc: A snack that Todd wants to eat. It may be childish for a child, but is just right for an adult.

140298.name: Hilt-Wood From the Arbor
140298.story_desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is wood from the Arbor, ready to be made into a weapon hilt. But in your eyes, this is just a tree branch. "The seed in the vessel gradually sprouts and countless twigs converge into one, as if an invisible hand is weaving it into the shape of a hilt." "Say what you want. This is still just a tree branch."

140299.name: Ignis Aureliae
140299.story_desc: In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is the metal required to forge divine weapons. But in your eyes, this is probably something Mr. Xiyan dug out of a trashcan. "This looks like someone barbecued it. Is it really safe?" "It's special effects. I added special effects."

140300.name: {TEXTJOIN#61}
140300.story_desc:
In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is the weapon you and {TEXTJOIN#59} managed to forge. You can tell at a glance that this {TEXTJOIN#61}, glowing with iridescent and otherworldly light, is no ordinary item.
In actuality, it is fitted with some LEDs in there. They light up if you press the switch. (Hold down the switch and the weapon will play a sound that says "Villain! Prepare to die!".)

140301.name: {TEXTJOIN#61}
140301.story_desc:
In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is the weapon you and {TEXTJOIN#59} managed to forge. You can tell at a glance that this {TEXTJOIN#61}, emitting an aura of pure danger, is no ordinary item.
It's actually a toy laser gun belonging to Mr. Xiyan's little niece. He forcibly got the toy off her to use it as a prop, and she didn't talk to him for three days. (He returned the toy laser gun to her later and apologized sincerely.)

140302.name: High Elders' Secret Treasure
140302.story_desc: Mr. Xiyan shoves a jewelry box into your hands. The box is full of fake emerald pendants made from green beer bottle glass and fake diamond rings made of glass marbles. He says this is the high elders' secret treasure. You say there's no way that's the case. He says he's the scriptwriter, not you. You decide to get him back later. "Never mind... just perform it like it's a mime without prop..."

140303.name: Legend of the Trailblazer
140303.story_desc: The storytelling collection that Mr. Xiyan had written based on your adventures. The title page contains "Based On A True Story" in big letters, but most of the content is made up. The process of making up this story was pure chaos, but honestly the final story was not half bad. Artistic creation is a wonder indeed. "The Trailblazer's legend continues!"

140304.name: {TEXTJOIN#61}
140304.story_desc:
In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is the weapon you and {TEXTJOIN#59} managed to forge. You can tell at a glance that this dark and faded {TEXTJOIN#61} has a legendary past.
Originally there were LEDs in there. They light up if you press the switch and looked really fancy. Then the batteries went flat and Mr. Xiyan hasn't gotten around to change them yet.

140305.name: {TEXTJOIN#61}
140305.story_desc:
In Mr. Xiyan's story, this is the weapon you and {TEXTJOIN#59} managed to forge. You can tell at a glance that this dark and faded {TEXTJOIN#61} has a legendary past.
It's actually a toy laser gun belonging to Mr. Xiyan's little niece. Then he ran its batteries flat, and she didn't talk to him for three days. (He returned the toy laser gun to her after replacing the batteries. They have now reconciled.)

140306.name: Pan-Cosmic Quick Diagnosis Booklet
140306.story_desc: Notes compiled by Little Tian. However, the perplexing rare illnesses within the cosmos have long exceeded her scope of expertise.

140307.name: Celestial Jade Techniques 101
140307.story_desc: Proof that Little Tian also plays Celestial Jade. One can imagine how Qingque and Little Tian became acquainted.

140308.name: Copy of Medical Certificate
140308.story_desc: Healer's note previously presented by Qingque. Later on, the Alchemy Commission dispatched specialists to verify the fictional ailments.

140309.name: Collaboration Invitation from the Interastral Peace Corporation
140309.story_desc: The IPC has sent invites to all guild merchants in Aurum Alley wishing to strike deals with all of them.

140310.name: Legend of the Trailblazer
140310.story_desc: Storytellers spin up tales all the time about heroes and heroines and legions and knights. Yet this tale goes beyond a storyteller's imagination — it draws inspiration from your extraordinary adventures. To find out what happens next, please tune in next time.

140311.name: March 7th's "Origin"
140311.story_desc: The Light Cone gifted by the Garden of Recollection to March 7th. The memory sealed within is none other than her "origin." "An eagle borne on mighty wings will never miss the cliffs it once fell from, and a full-mast ship will never miss the beach where she once ran aground. And you, my child, know that the past is as intangible as a hazy mirage. But everything you are experiencing right now will surely be etched in stone by those who come after."

140312.name: Drops from Abominations of Abundance
140312.story_desc: An item obtained from the Abundance Sprite: Wooden Lupus. It is not a natural creation, and its edibility is unknown. "Seriously? They're trying to unshackle this thing? Are they just trying to 'unshackle' themselves from life?"

140313.name: Yongren's Documentation
140313.story_desc: Confidential documents from the Seat of Divine Foresight. It records the entire process of Yongren joining the Cloud Knights. "Codename: 27-149"

140314.name: Authorized Recordings by Mr. Xiyan
140314.story_desc: Recordings of Mr. Xiyan's storytelling, can be played repeatedly. "Last time, we were talking about..."

140315.name: Authorized Recordings by Back'n and Forth
140315.story_desc: Recordings of Back'n and Forth's crosstalk routine. Can be played repeatedly. "I will be presenting a crosstalk segment today..." "Since you can do it yourself, what am I here for."

140316.name: Mr. Huo's Confidential Merchandise
140316.story_desc: The "goods" that Mr. Huo entrusted you to transport, the box is tightly wrapped, and you can't see what's inside. "Top secret! Looking's for free, but don't touch!"

140317.name: Manuscript of Wisdom
140317.story_desc: A forbidden text readable only by the illiterate, for when those of literary awareness lay gaze upon its pages, they run the risk of being stripped clean of all knowledge. "Alright. Got it all in your head yet?" "My head's empty. I've forgotten everything."

140318.name: Manuscript of Silence
140318.story_desc: A book readable only by the blind. It is said that reading this text will grant one a special kind of awareness and alter their perception of the world. "It's not like a sound echoing within your mind, but the actual presence of someone by your side."

140319.name: Manuscript of Delirium
140319.story_desc: A text that can drive one mad if even glanced upon. Not every victim experiences the same kind of insanity, but most types of madness remained extremely dangerous. "Don'treaditdon'treaditdon'treadit."

140320.name: Cognition Chasm: Confidence Crisis
140320.story_desc:
"We've been through a huge crisis and are still recovering... but there are some who are trying to exploit the chaos to agitate the workforce."
"People are growing more and more distrustful of the management here. It's probably turned into a big headache for Asta too."

140321.name: Cognition Chasm: Researchers' Disappearance
140321.story_desc:
"Some researchers have been questioning the management and security of the space station ever since the invasion."
"Things had settled down a bit with the reconstruction efforts, but the researchers' disappearances has rattled them again."

140322.name: Cognition Chasm: The Xianzhou Alliance
140322.story_desc:
"A Curio without a body but is alive... I've heard of such a species."
"A colleague who came back from a business trip said that the Xianzhou Alliance has lifeforms like that."

140323.name: Cognition Chasm: Energy Lifeform
140323.story_desc:
"I heard something like that also exists in the Xianzhou Alliance."
"Ah, that's right. They're called heliobi. I guess you could say that wubbaboos and heliobi are sort of like cousins — both are types of energy lifeforms."

140324.name: Cognition Chasm: Spontaneous Human Combustion
140324.story_desc:
"That means every victim's disappearance was accompanied by incomprehensible fires."
"When we made visits to the scenes, some witness testimonies proved that too..."
"The words they used were... 'Spontaneous combustion of the human body.'"

140325.name: Cognition Chasm: Genius Society Member
140325.story_desc:
"Let me describe it again in case you forgot: It's an energy lifeform. It doesn't have a body, but it is alive."
"An energy lifeform?"
"That's not the point. I wouldn't be bothering with it if it didn't have something to do with the Genius Society."

140326.name: Clue: Missing Researcher List
140326.story_desc: Arlan compiled a list of victims during the investigation of the spontaneous human body combustion incidents. On the surface, these people have nothing in common with each other, but perceptive ones like Pamela still found subtle connections between them.

140327.name: Clue: "Phrase"
140327.story_desc: Wen Shiling said Adler kept muttering the word "phrase" before he disappeared. Is it possible that it was some other word with a similar pronunciation?

140328.name: Clue: Booklet
140328.story_desc: The booklet Adler was reading up to his disappearance. It records the lives of a few Genius Society members — The content consists of quite a few pieces of interesting information.

140329.name: Clue: Dimension-Phasing Flame
140329.story_desc: According to Dan Heng's speculation, Ifrit's flame may have abilities other than just burning. Moreover, there happens to be a kind of fire that can phase through dimensions and possesses similar properties — "Burns through worlds, leaving numerous scions of flame behind."

140330.name: Cognition Chasm: Confidence Crisis
140330.story_desc:
"We've been through a huge crisis and are still recovering... but there are some who are trying to exploit the chaos to agitate the workforce."
"People are growing more and more distrustful of the management here. It's probably turned into a big headache for Asta too."

140331.name: A Letter of Unknown Origin
140331.story_desc: A letter of unknown origin. Its penmanship is like swordplay, strokes unrestrained.

140334.name: Cognition Chasm: Spontaneous Human Combustion
140334.story_desc:
"That means every victim's disappearance was accompanied by incomprehensible fires."
"When we made visits to the scenes, some witness testimonies proved that too..."
"The words they used were... 'Spontaneous combustion of the human body.'"

140335.name: Cognition Chasm: Genius Society Member
140335.story_desc:
"Let me describe it again in case you forgot: It's an energy lifeform. It doesn't have a body, but it is alive."
"An energy lifeform?"
"That's not the point. I wouldn't be bothering with it if it didn't have something to do with the Genius Society."

140336.name: Memory Sorting
140336.story_desc: The timeline of the Trailblazer's own actions around the period Herta was attacked. This was reconstructed by the Trailblazer via sorting out their memories.

140339.name: Case Review (I)
140339.story_desc: While you are experiencing this Dreamscape, you can re-examine the details of the puzzle whenever you wish. This seems to be a convenient feature prepared by Dr. Edward. He's so nice.

140340.name: Case Review (II)
140340.story_desc: While you are experiencing this Dreamscape, you can re-examine the details of the puzzle whenever you wish. This seems to be a convenient feature prepared by Dr. Edward. He's so nice.

140341.name: Evidence: Shamari's ID
140341.story_desc: The ID belonging to Shamari, a worker of the Talent Motivation Department in the Interastral Peace Corporation. Most IPC staff value their ID greatly. Apparently, some have even "installed" it onto their forehead, ensuring that they can show it off to people wherever they go. Sparkle probably left it at the crime scene to prove that she really did assault someone.

140342.name: Evidence: Giant Wooden Hammer
140342.story_desc: The giant wooden hammer Sparkle used to attack Shamari. It seems to be a custom-made model specifically for her. It is extremely heavy, and even Sampo can't lift it in one hand. What a herculean woman.

140343.name: Evidence: Goldhammer Residence Security Regulations
140343.story_desc:
A copy of the Goldhammer Residence Security Regulations. Sparkle probably made it up on the spot just for this detective game. It says:
"To prevent criminals from hurting our great and lovely Miss Sparkle, the Goldhammer Residence shall abide by the following regulations from today onwards:
1. All retainers and visitors must enter and exit the Golden Hammer Residence using the facial recognition system.
2. Those who cannot pass through the facial recognition system will be killed on the spot.
3. These regulations are in effect indefinitely."

140344.name: Evidence: "Mutual Assured Destruction" Button
140344.story_desc: Apparently, one little press on this button will level all of Penacony. Who wouldn't want to try pressing it?

140345.name: Evidence: Pom-Pom Toy
140345.story_desc: An exquisite Pom-Pom toy. Who knows why Sparkle would have something like this... Maybe it's truly because the Conductor's beauty is famous throughout the cosmos?

140346.name: Evidence: Qian Ketong's Account Book
140346.story_desc: The account book of the rich merchant, Qian Ketong. For a merchant, it is probably something second-only in importance to money. Sparkle probably left it at the crime scene to prove that she really did assault someone.

140347.name: Evidence: Lefton's Tie
140347.story_desc: A couture tie. The label says "For Master Lefton's Use Only."

140348.name: Evidence: Wright's Stool
140348.story_desc: A small stool with two small footprints drawn on it using a crayon, indicating it once belonged to a Pepeshi worker. This is perhaps the most crude out of all the "evidence"... Miss Sparkle had fallen from her pedestal.

140349.name: Evidence: Zhongshan's Ring
140349.story_desc: An expensive-looking ring. The words "Zhongshan's Heirloom" are carved on its side.

140350.name: Evidence: Smoked Red Herring
140350.story_desc:
This "evidence" is obviously something comical Sparkle made. To avoid you thinking that you wasted time investigating this useless evidence, here's a recipe —
Smoke the red herring (or any other type of preserved fish) until it turns golden on both sides. Place it into a dish, remove all bones, then crush the meat. Add raw eggs into the frying pan and fry it until well done, then add vegetables you like and fry that too. Then, add in the crushed smoked red herring and day-old rice. Add some salt (be very careful with how much you put in! There's already preserved fish in it!), stir-fry evenly, then plate.
And voila! Here's a Smoked Red Herring Fried Rice.
You're welcome.

140351.name: Proof of Trust
140351.story_desc: It is hard to explain why a trashcan places its trust in you, but its trust feels remarkably heavy.

140352.name: Nameless's Memory Bubble
140352.story_desc: An unusual dream bubble said to contain the dreams of Akivili, a fallen Aeon. "I'm sorry... I truly am the worst Nameless in the world."

140354.name: Heliobus: Arkeri
140354.story_desc: The heliobus possessing March 7th's camera. Pure and kind, they longs for the sceneries in the pictures that she took. "There's still so much I haven't done... so many sights I haven't seen..."

140355.name: Gift From a Fan
140355.story_desc: Gifts sent by Guinaifen's enthusiastic, stalking fan. "Little Gui, you're really cool. I like you even more now!"

140356.name: Property Deed
140356.story_desc: A property deed faded with time. It is registered under Renault, an outworlder, which doesn't match the "Renault" you've encountered before.

140357.name: Gold Subscription Commemorative Medallion
140357.story_desc: The commemorative medallion sent by Ghostly Grove to influencers attaining one million subscribers. "Congratulations, you have one million subscribers on Ghostly Grove!"

140358.name: Silver Subscription Commemorative Medallion
140358.story_desc: The commemorative medallion sent by Ghostly Grove to influencers attaining one hundred thousand subscribers. "Congratulations, you have one hundred thousand subscribers on Ghostly Grove!"

140361.name: Lunaumbra Gourd
140361.story_desc: The specialized exorcism tool created by the Ten-Lords Commission for dealing with heliobi. It captures heliobi and locks them inside. "It can absorb the malevolent energy between heaven and earth, possessing the ability to ward off evil and avert calamity."

140362.name: Harmonic Chime
140362.story_desc: The specialized exorcism tool created by the Ten-Lords Commission for dealing with heliobi. Ring the bell to resonate it with heliobi's illusory maze. "With resounding clarity, it purifies all directions."

140363.name: Fragmented Record of Belobog Ancient Martial Arts
140363.story_desc:
A ruined booklet. The pages are yellowish and fragile, and the notes written are extremely blurred. It is said that some of its text records some long-lost ancient Belobogian martial arts techniques.

"I am almost certain that this booklet was made to look old by being fed to Funeral Worms before soaked in Moo-Moo urine... But the contents written upon its pages might very well be real, as certain contemporary texts can attest. Ah... Don't cry yet, let's get the appraisal fee settled first, thank you." — Balaway "Miner's Lamp"

140364.name: Guqin Recording
140364.story_desc: Recordings of a guqin being played at Swallowsong Pavilion. The recordingly can be played repeatedly. "Towering like that of a mountain, flowing like that of rapid water..."

140365.name: New Guqin Recording
140365.story_desc: Recordings of a guqin music piece downloaded from the network. The recording can be played repeatedly. "An introduction for to-be guqin-lovers."

140366.name: Unusually Colored Lodestone
140366.story_desc: A lodestone dropped from an unknown source. Life hack: You can use a lodestone to move metal objects on the other side of a piece of cardboard.

140367.name: Courtyard Gate Key
140367.story_desc: Looks like a key to unlock a moon gate.

140370.name: Courtyard Gate Key
140370.story_desc: Looks like a key to unlock a moon gate.

140372.name: Family Photo
140372.story_desc: A picture of a family of three. On it is written: "When we first arrived in Xianzhou — Renault." It seems to be dated about a hundred years ago...

140373.name: Discarded Letter Sheets
140373.story_desc: A stack of discarded, unused letter paper. The owner seems to have written a few pages before stopping, much like a sudden and transient enthusiasm for learning.

140374.name: Rubbings on Paper
140374.story_desc: Text obtained through rubbing the faint engravings on a stone monument to a piece of tracing paper. Appears to have been intentionally left behind by the homeowner.

140376.name: Square Rice Ball
140376.story_desc: A square-shaped rice "ball" taken out of a lunchbox. Different foods are mixed together within. It might taste good?

140377.name: Shattered Cloud Knight Devastator Glaive
140377.story_desc: Broken weapon fragments, sharp enough to be used as a paper cutter.

140378.name: Old Bell
140378.story_desc: An old bell. It can produce a clear, crisp sound, and looks like an item used to attract small animals.

140380.name: Longevity Pill of Cruelty
140380.story_desc: A medicine exclusive to the Xianzhou Yaoqing, said to have the effect of improving overall fitness and rendering those who take it immune to all diseases for a short period of time. On the Yaoqing, legend holds that a healer who went by the surname of Yu fell in love with a Foxian trader girl. But the Vidyadhara could live for a thousand years, much longer than the Foxians. Yu searched for ways to release his lover from the grip of death. He fell for the trickery of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus and asked his lover to take the longevity medicine of Abundance without telling her what it was. The Foxian girl turned into an abomination that no longer loved him before being slain by the Cloud Knights. To prevent Yu, who was overwhelmed by grief, from becoming mara-struck, the Alchemy Commission ordered him to take the Longevity Pill of Cruelty that deprived him of love and desire until his demise. The legend has another version, in which Yu was not of the Vidyadhara but a mere mortal, and the Foxian girl was a spy planted by the Disciples to infiltrate the Alchemy Commission. This version is not as popular, for it turns a romance story into a political power struggle. "Those who love and live deeply fall into mara, while those who sever desire and passions can live for a millennium. Ask yourself, then, why fear mara, and why take joy in a long life?"

140381.name: Unremarkable Trash
140381.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140382.name: One-of-a-Kind Trash
140382.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140383.name: Dispersed Heliobi
140383.story_desc: These appear to be heliobi fragments scattered across the land when Cirrus shattered. "Powerful heliobi can possibly swallow weaker ones and temporarily force them to be joined as one..." "However, upon being affected by an outside force, this equilibrium is also easy to collapse."

140384.name: Dispersed Heliobi
140384.story_desc: These appear to be heliobi fragments scattered across the land when Cirrus shattered. "Powerful heliobi can possibly swallow weaker ones and temporarily force them to be joined as one..." "However, upon being affected by an outside force, this equilibrium is also easy to collapse."

140385.name: Dispersed Heliobi
140385.story_desc: These appear to be heliobi fragments scattered across the land when Cirrus shattered. "Powerful heliobi can possibly swallow weaker ones and temporarily force them to be joined as one..." "However, upon being affected by an outside force, this equilibrium is also easy to collapse."

140386.name: Ordinary Trash
140386.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140387.name: Unspectacular Trash
140387.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140388.name: Average Trash
140388.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140389.name: Common Trash
140389.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140390.name: Unpretentious Trash
140390.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140391.name: Lackluster Trash
140391.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140392.name: Unnoteworthy Trash
140392.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140393.name: Swarthy Trash
140393.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140394.name: Numbers-got-Nerfed Trash
140394.story_desc: A trash bag filled with celestial jade tiles. Celestial jade tiles possess differing levels of rarity, and the sorting can be seen from the colors of the trash bags. "Enjoy responsibly, spend wisely."

140395.name: Emotion Prototype: The Moment of Betrayal
140395.story_desc: You will always remember the trust and gentleness of that person, the persuasion and incitement from those people, and the surprised whisper from that person the moment you drew your dagger. "Et tu, my child?"

140396.name: Emotion Prototype: The Cloud of Doubt
140396.story_desc: You sit up, a cloud of sadness forming in your mind. The words you have promised to others begin to falter. Are you really not a loser? Can you really achieve anything? Have you really chosen the right path? A fire ignites from the depths of your heart, and for one moment, you're tempted to burn everything from the past to the ground... "And that spark had already been ignited long ago."

140397.name: Emotion Prototype: Everlasting Hatred
140397.story_desc: As you read this message, please consider the following advice: Send a message to your nemesis and tell them that you have forgiven them. "Our lives are too short to be wasted on feuds."

140398.name: Emotion Prototype: Broken Dreams
140398.story_desc: Shards like this can be found everywhere throughout Penacony. They once belonged to broken hearts. "In the realm of black dreams I sleep, where distinctions of right or wrong are buried deep."

140399.name: Emotion Prototype: Momentary Freedom
140399.story_desc: As the airship traverses the sky, leaving behind a trail of clouds, the IPC's pursuers disappear from sight. You exchange a high-five with your companions, feeling liberated from any constraints... However, this is not the end. The looming threat of prison remains. It may be ten years or a hundred, but eventually, you will return to it. "Until then, let's savor our freedom to the fullest."

140400.name: Unknown Puzzle Fragment
140400.story_desc:
This fragment appears to have been a part of a certain Dream Jigsaw.
You can feel from it a mixture of confusion, fear, grief, and an almost imperceptible determination to face death head-on.

140401.name: Firefly's Budget
140401.story_desc:
The meagre private funds of Firefly, a new artist of the Iris Family.
Use it wisely. It's someone else's money, after all.

140402.name: Cosmic Fried Rice (Overnight Edition)
140402.story_desc: The researchers' favorite work meal. It's not very fresh and not very clean. One wonders whether one will see the Aeons after eating it.

140403.name: Abnormal images from surveillance records
140403.story_desc: Surveillance images provided by the security robot. It records the suspicious figure that recently approached the door security system.

140404.name: External communication records
140404.story_desc: Data copied from the space station's terminal. It clearly and comprehensively records all external communication from the terminal.

140405.name: Freshly-Baked Cake
140405.story_desc: Fresh and tasty cake. Probably dropped by some unfortunate researcher.

140406.name: "Calm" Gear
140406.story_desc: A manifestation of the emotion "Calm" in the Dreamscape. It can be used to repair people's Emo Dial and recover their lost emotions or memories.

140407.name: "Happy" Gear
140407.story_desc: A manifestation of the emotion "Happy" in the Dreamscape. It can be used to repair people's Emo Dial and recover their lost emotions or memories.

140408.name: "Sad" Gear
140408.story_desc: A manifestation of the emotion "Sad" in the Dreamscape. It can be used to repair people's Emo Dial and recover their lost emotions or memories.

140409.name: "Angry" Gear
140409.story_desc: A manifestation of the emotion "Angry" in the Dreamscape. It can be used to repair people's Emo Dial and recover their lost emotions or memories.

140410.name: Lesley Dean's Rebirth Project
140410.story_desc: A petition calling on Lesley Dean's fans to enter the Dreamscape en masse and help him to "be reborn" through the Synesthesia Dreamscape.

140412.name: Half-Autographed Photo
140412.story_desc: Evidence that Lesley Dean once gained a new lease of life. "Not even death could extinguish his radiance."

140414.name: Aventurine's Token
140414.story_desc: A token of the Interastral Peace Corporation. You remember the envoy played a little trick with it.

140415.name: Steinway Falcon Luxury Speedster (Black)
140415.story_desc: A luxurious private Steinway Falcon Speedster, featuring a low-profile black color. "Steinway Falcon Speedster: Making your dream come true faster!"

140416.name: Steinway Falcon Luxury Speedster (Rental)
140416.story_desc: A luxurious private Steinway Falcon Speedster. The most commonly rented model. "Steinway Falcon Speedster: Making your dream come true faster!"

140417.name: Steinway Falcon Luxury Speedster (Gold)
140417.story_desc: A luxurious private Steinway Falcon Speedster, featuring an extravagant golden color. "Steinway Falcon Speedster: Making your dream come true faster!"

140418.name: Steinway Falcon Luxury Speedster (Blue)
140418.story_desc: A luxurious private Steinway Falcon Speedster, featuring a stylish blue color. "Steinway Falcon Speedster: Making your dream come true faster!"

140419.name: Utopon Unicycler
140419.story_desc: The luxury "Utopon" unicycler, inspired by wind instruments, boasts an elegant design and provides a safe riding experience without having to worry about traffic jams! "Transform every one of your trips into an unforgettable journey."

140420.name: Envision a Rose Forthcoming
140420.story_desc: An old record tape discovered at the hotel in the Dreamscape, containing a single track titled "Envision a Rose Forthcoming."

140421.name: Employees' Idle Chatter
140421.story_desc: Bocchi's co-workers seem to have a grudge against him because they are forced to work overtime. Feinman seems to have something to do with this.

140422.name: TV News
140422.story_desc: A news article about a swindler being caught. I'm writing this down, although I don't know how Bocchi can be related to the case.

140423.name: Project: Scarab
140423.story_desc: Bocchi's "Precious Proposal." You're uncertain whether it'll see any use.

140424.name: Bizarre Tape
140424.story_desc: A weird voicetape. A terrifying nightmare.

140425.name: Note: Searching for Mother in Dreamscape (I)
140425.story_desc: In the lobby of The Reverie, you encounter a father and daughter who seem to be searching for a long-lost relative in Penacony. Perhaps you will meet them again in Penacony's Dreamscape metropolis.

140426.name: Note: Searching for Mother in Dreamscape (II)
140426.story_desc: The father and daughter, seeking their relative's whereabouts in Penacony, inquire about a woman named "Charlotte the Dream Artist." A helpful banker informs them that artists in Penacony often gather in a restricted area known as the "Edge." Perhaps that will be their next destination.

140427.name: Note: Searching for Mother in Dreamscape (III)
140427.story_desc: Once more, you cross paths with the father and daughter at the Dream's Edge. They have yet to find Charlotte, however, they have discovered that Penacony's finest artists frequently assemble at The Reverie in the Dreamscape. Although the hotel in the Dreamscape is presently undergoing renovations, their determination remains unwavering as they plan to proceed there...

140428.name: Note: Searching for Mother in Dreamscape (IV)
140428.story_desc: In the end, the father and daughter locate their long-lost wife and mother at the hotel in the Dreamscape. However, she refuses to reunite with her family. Following a heartrending conversation, the father and daughter leave the dream world in frustration, leaving you wondering if you will ever encounter them in reality...

140429.name: Lucky One's Black Card
140429.story_desc:
The grand prize awarded by Dreamy Slots, but there are no instructions on how to use it.






...Well, for those who have read this far, it's unsightly to give you no hints. Let me tell you a secret: It's a room key.

140430.name: Golden Limited - Aideen Token
140430.story_desc:
This shiny gold token appears to hold great value and can potentially be exchanged for an incredible super jackpot, but nobody in the Golden Hour knows how to use it.
Nevertheless, remember the words: "Promising Future."

140431.name: Medicine of Unknown Use
140431.story_desc: A mysterious medicine Screwllum handed to you. It may evoke the memories buried deep within Professor Chadwick's consciousness.

140432.name: Eerie Building Block
140432.story_desc:
This box contains eerie puzzle building blocks. It can be returned to the Dream Ticker Administrator.
Puzzle blocks that make the Dream Tickers malfunction are sealed here, emitting an ominous aura.

140433.name: Ace Gambler's Discarded Part
140433.story_desc: A part given to you by an Intellitron guest known as the "Ace Gambler." Its purpose remains a mystery. "Just carry it with you, even if as a talisman."

140434.name: Ace Gambler's Precious Part
140434.story_desc: A part given to you by an Intellitron guest known as the "Ace Gambler." It is said to contain a miniature transmitter that manipulates the outcome of the capsule machine, but it is no longer functional. "Don't frown all day. Put a smile on that face!"

140435.name: Soulheal Special Mix
140435.story_desc: A special beverage given to you by Giovanna the dream nurse. It helps to suppress negative emotions and assists people in engaging with their normal jobs and lives.

140436.name: Components From a Certain Ruin
140436.story_desc: This is a part found in the ruins of the Pasdrak City Civic Center. Its original purpose is now impossible to discover. Swanga now carries this part with him at all times as a reminder to always recall the blood and tears of the revolutionaries.

140437.name: Handwritten Letter
140437.story_desc: A delicately wrapped letter by Pom-Pom with a message expressing gratitude. "Thank you for the gift, passenger {NICKNAME}!"

140438.name: Handwritten Letter
140438.story_desc: A delicately wrapped letter by Dan Heng with a message expressing gratitude. "Thank you for your gift. I like it."

140439.name: Handwritten Letter
140439.story_desc: A delicately wrapped letter by Welt with a message expressing gratitude. "Thanks for the candy. I'll keep the rest for when we all come back to share."

140466.name: Hanu's Dream Bubble
140466.story_desc: The reward for beating the game Hanu's Prison Break, capturing all of Hanu's highlights in the story. Perhaps similar scenes did happen in real history.

140468.name: Indefinite Patent Operative Omnifier
140468.story_desc: This item is used to defend the legal rights of the great inventor Emmr... Ahem, well, to defend the legal rights of all creators in the cosmos.

140469.name: "Happy" Gear
140469.story_desc: Extract emotions of "happiness" from passersby to fill in the missing aspects for the Dreamer's Emo Dial.

149957.name: Photo With March 7th
149957.story_desc: {NICKNAME} and March 7th's group photo. "We adventure together, explore together, and capture wonderful memories together. In the journeys to come, we will "trailblaze" more beautiful moments, preserving them with our camera, our eyes, and our hearts."

149958.name: Photo With March 7th
149958.story_desc: {NICKNAME} and March 7th's group photo. "We adventure together, explore together, and capture wonderful memories together. In the journeys to come, we will "trailblaze" more beautiful moments, preserving them with our camera, our eyes, and our hearts."

149959.name: Thermic Core
149959.story_desc: Modified by Serval, the Silvermane Guards' Snowshine Lamps can now automatically transfer kindlings.

149975.name: Blurry Photo
149975.story_desc: An old yellowing photo. Evidence of a certain individual's part in a certain historic event. The figure in the picture did not seem to plan to let people feel the historical weight this photo should carry. "What will become of Belobog in a hundred years? Well, you'll have to see it through your eyes."

149976.name: Blurry Portrait
149976.story_desc: A small circular frame with a portrait within. Evidence of a certain individual's part in a certain historic event. The figure in the picture did not seem to plan to let people feel the historical weight this photo should carry. "What will become of Belobog in a hundred years? Well, you'll have to see it through your eyes."

149977.name: Portrait With a Clue
149977.story_desc: A small circular frame with a portrait. The expression of the man dressed in an old military uniform in the frame is... complicated. A clockwise-pointing arrow is drawn on the back, accompanied by the phrase "The next clue sleeps soundly in the shade of the arch." "What will become of Belobog in a hundred years? Well, you'll have to see it through your eyes."

149978.name: Pela's Notes
149978.story_desc: Pela's notes with her elegant handwriting. In the note, there is a curved arrow pointing clockwise and another pointing counterclockwise. Next to the drawing, there is a comment that reads "Might have something to do with a certain kind of rotatable structure." "...G—Give me back that piece of paper, or I'll take it!"

149979.name: Edited Note
149979.story_desc: Pela's notes with her elegant handwriting. The clues you find in the Fragmentum are recorded here. In the note, there is a curved arrow pointing clockwise, another pointing counterclockwise, and another pointing clockwise. Next to the drawing, there is a comment that reads "Might have something to do with a certain kind of rotatable structure." "...G—Give me back that piece of paper, or I'll take it!"

149980.name: Training Certificate
149980.story_desc: A certificate for participants in restricted zone training. Evidence of having defeated the Silvermane Guards before.

149981.name: Training Certificate
149981.story_desc: A certificate for participants in restricted zone training. Evidence of having defeated the Silvermane Guards before.

149982.name: Training Certificate
149982.story_desc: A certificate for participants in restricted zone training. Evidence of having defeated the Silvermane Guards before.

149991.name: Box of Metal Plates and Bandages
149991.story_desc: Medical supplies urgently needed by Natasha. "A full box of metal plates and bandages, exactly what Natasha needs."

150000.name: Hanu's Adventure Foreword
150000.story_desc: A limited edition cartoon storybook released by Clock Studios, narrating a tale where Hanu shrinks in size and saves Dreamville... The book includes occasional peculiar dialogue interspersed throughout.

150001.name: Hanu's Adventure Part 1, Chapter 1
150001.story_desc: A limited edition cartoon storybook released by Clock Studios, narrating a tale where Hanu shrinks in size and saves Dreamville... The book includes occasional peculiar dialogue interspersed throughout.

150002.name: Hanu's Adventure Part 1, Chapter 2
150002.story_desc: A limited edition cartoon storybook released by Clock Studios, narrating a tale where Hanu shrinks in size and saves Dreamville... The book includes occasional peculiar dialogue interspersed throughout.

150003.name: Hanu's Adventure Part 1, Chapter 3
150003.story_desc: A limited edition cartoon storybook released by Clock Studios, narrating a tale where Hanu shrinks in size and saves Dreamville... The book includes occasional peculiar dialogue interspersed throughout.

150004.name: Hanu's Adventure Part 1, Chapter 4
150004.story_desc: A limited edition cartoon storybook released by Clock Studios, narrating a tale where Hanu shrinks in size and saves Dreamville... The book includes occasional peculiar dialogue interspersed throughout.

180001.name: Solid Water
180001.story_desc: Compound composed of hydrogen and oxygen, essential to support carbon-based life. Keeping it in the solid state makes it easy to carry. "...Isn't it ice?" "No, no, no. Ice is ice, this is water, just in the solid state." "...Isn't that the definition of ice?"
come_from: Storage Zone: Baryons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

180002.name: Basic Ingredients
180002.story_desc: Ingredients that keep you fed but taste less than ideal. Not particularly good, but is edible. "Can I eat it? Is it good? What do I eat it with?"
come_from: Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

180004.name: Phlogiston
180004.story_desc: Particles that form the flame. Genius Society #2 Harald Punch proved its existence, but #3 Nyul Iman disproved it. #7 Bohdan overthrew Iman's conclusion and proved it again before getting killed by #4 Polka Kakamond days after announcing Phlogiston's existence. "Does it exist or not? We're not interested, frankly speaking."
come_from: Backwater Pass: Flamespawns or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

180005.name: Metal
180005.story_desc: A substance abundant in planets' crust and the ocean. Very useful, very handy. "I've been to a planet where the locals consume metals to get superpowers. Please don't do that at home, as most metals are not digestible by humans."
come_from: Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

180006.name: Gaseous Liquid
180006.story_desc: Is it fog, rain, or wind? You can't tell if it's still in the container without lifting the lid. "The answer my friend, is blowing in the gaseous liquid..." "The answer is blowing in the gaseous liquid."
come_from: Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

180007.name: Seed
180007.story_desc: Reproductive unit unique to plants. Most of them symbolize life, some of them taste pretty good. "Sow in the spring, harvest in the Autumn."
come_from: Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

180008.name: Discarded Ingenium Parts
180008.story_desc: To a bystander, it's just trash. To a craftsman, it's leftover materials. To a recycler, it's credits. Only skilled artisans who truly understand the art of ingenia can see valuable treasures in what others deem wasteful. "It is said that in the Great Trial of the Furnace, to challenge Mr. Yingxing, they gave him a pile of defective products and waste. But after a day and night, he crafted a lifelike mechanical lion that moved as if it was alive."

180009.name: Human-Height Auspicious Crops
180009.story_desc: The robust and bountiful rice ears are astonishingly as tall as a person. In certain agricultural and pastoral delves of Xianzhou, such towering auspicious crops can be found everywhere. "The scholars who planted them hoped that people would never have to experience the feeling of hunger again."

180010.name: Tranquility
180010.story_desc: After a long day of work or school, you savagely dive onto your bed on a Friday night, ready to hide there for the next two days. "Turn off your cell phone, and if anyone asks on Monday why they couldn't reach you, just say your cell phone ran away from home, and you just managed to talk it into coming back."
come_from: The Reverie Hotel: Memory Zone Meme "Allseer" or other enemies

180011.name: Broken Dreams
180011.story_desc: Shards like this can be found everywhere throughout Penacony. They once belonged to broken hearts. "In the realm of black dreams I sleep, where distinctions of right or wrong are buried deep."
come_from: The Reverie Hotel: Memory Zone Meme "Allseer" or other enemies

180012.name: Rusty Gear
180012.story_desc: Gears themselves are not rare, but finding gears that meet the specifications is no easy task. With rapid advancements in technology, these outdated parts are being discarded in large quantities. "The best gear is always the one that fits perfectly."
come_from: The Reverie Hotel: Dreamjolt Troupe's Mr. Domescreen or other enemies

181001.name: Mechanical Parts
181001.story_desc: Essential components of all machines with strange shapes and specific functions. Without them, nothing can be made. "With the same parts, Screwllum can make entire planets and create cyborgs. But you can only make me a watch that runs seven seconds late every day." "Seven seconds is good enough! Just a hair later than the clocks they use in observatories."
come_from: Robot Settlement: Automatons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

181002.name: Virtual Particle
181002.story_desc: Tiny particles commonly found in the universe but cannot be observed in theory. Scientists are good at transforming theories into reality. "I've got a virtual particle and an anti virtual particle here. How do we turn them into a real particle and a real antiparticle? Now, look closely..."
come_from: Storage Zone: Baryons or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

181003.name: Protein Rice
181003.story_desc: Nature's gift to human society, friend of mankind, savior of lives. Smooth as egg white and full of protein. "Every grain costs sweat and blood."
come_from: Storage Zone: Voidranger: Reavers or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in the Herta Space Station

181004.name: Feather of Flame
181004.story_desc: Warm dark feather with a weak ember at its tip. Sparks trail the feather as it's waved around. "The legend of the Phoenix spreads far throughout the entire universe..."
come_from: Cloudford: Mara-Struck Soldiers or other enemies
Found in destructible objects in Jarilo-VI

181005.name: Core of Ice
181005.story_desc: Shattered ice fallen from the stars. The frosty mist it emits when removed from a specialized canister looks like the breath of wintertime. "Zoom in on a snowflake 100 times and behold the wonder of nature."
come_from: Corridor of Fading Echoes: Everwinter Shadewalkers or other enemies

181006.name: Eye of Lightning
181006.story_desc: An electric ball made from captured lightning. If its balance is tipped by a conductor, it emits a lightning ball. "A genius in the past wanted to use Eye of Lightning to search for aliens. For this, Nous cast their gaze upon her. Not sure which is the bigger win: found aliens for real or got noticed by Nous?"
come_from: Corridor of Fading Echoes: Everwinter Shadewalkers or other enemies

181007.name: Vortex of Wind
181007.story_desc: The eye of the storm remains stagnant. Even when put in vacuum, the grains involved in the vortex continue to revolve around the eye of the storm. "Look, they won't stop no matter what happens. They just keep whirling. You know what that reminds me of?" "Trailblazing!" "...That's right, Pom-Pom. Promise me that our trailblazing journey will never come to a stop."
